info.title: Cybersecurity Graph Analysis API
info.description: Multi-Agent Cybersecurity Analyst System API for analyzing cybersecurity questions

post.description:
Analyze a cybersecurity question using the multi-agent system.
    
    The system uses three specialized agents:
    - **Generator**: Analyzes questions and generates structured plans
    - **Executor**: Executes Cypher queries against Neo4j
    - **Refiner**: Validates results and produces actionable insights
    
    Returns a comprehensive analysis including:
    - Status and summary
    - Threat level assessment
    - Confidence score
    - Actionable recommendations
    - Query results and data

200.description: Analysis results with recommendations and data

get.summary: Return the last raw Neo4j query results
get.description: Returns the last raw, untruncated Neo4j query results produced by the ExecutorAgent. Use with care â€” payloads can be large and may contain sensitive data.
